title: Top countries by pharmaceutical industry employment 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 20 number of Countrys.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Turkey.
The lowest value at Country Turkey is 65.57x times less than the highest value at China.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 20 number of Countrys.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Turkey.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 20 number of Countrys.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Turkey.
The lowest value at Country Turkey is 65.57x times less than the highest value at China.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The maximum Number of employees 2301534.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 35100.0.
The second highest Number of employees is appeared to be the Country India.
The difference of Number of employees between the highest and lowest Country is 2266434.0.
Country China is higher than any other Countrys with value 2301534.0, followed by India, and United States. Down to Country Turkey with the lowest value 35100.0.
The lowest value 35100.0 at Turkey is almost 11.21 times smaller than the average value 205369.8.
The Number of employees is 4107396.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
